operations.title: Get Collections
operations.description: Returns the list of collections published

parameters.title: Modified After
parameters.name: modified_after
parameters.tooltip: Value as an Epoch Timestamp. A list of collections will be returned only if the feed has been refreshed after this time.
parameters.description: Value as an Epoch Timestamp. A list of collections will be returned only if the feed has been refreshed after this time.

parameters.title: Collection ID
parameters.name: collectionID
parameters.tooltip: Collection for which the events are to be fetched

parameters.title: Modified After
parameters.name: modified_after
parameters.tooltip: Value as an Epoch Timestamp. Event data will be returned only if the feed has been refreshed after this time.
parameters.description: Value as an Epoch Timestamp. Event data will be returned only if the feed has been refreshed after this time.

parameters.title: Process response as
parameters.name: output_mode
options: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.value: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.tooltip: The Feed Data can either be returned as a JSON; written to a file on the FortiSOAR server; or Created as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.description: The Feed Data can either be returned as a JSON; written to a file on the FortiSOAR server; or Created as Feed Records in FortiSOAR

Save to File.title: Filename
Save to File.name: filename
Save to File.tooltip: The file will be created under /tmp
